Comments_List: Basics of commutative algebra with a categorical flavor.
Personally I think it could have included more content, e.g. more on Spec of a ring or integralness.

Definitely. Its content is among the most basic and essential ones in mathematics, foundation to different branches of maths including algebra, algebraic geometry, number theory, etc. The use of categorical language is also important and enlightening.
